title: Custom Build/Run Options
description: These options are used when the Build and Run option for this Task. This allows you to have a different main application file and output folder while using this Task.

children.title: Main application
children.description: If you want a custom main application for this Task, you can change that here. Make sure there is also a matching `-app.xml` file!

children.title: Output folder
children.description: The location of where this Task's build will be made. If blank, it uses the project's Output folder. Use "./" if you want it at the root of your project.

children.title: Use a specific SDK for this task
children.description: Use this to select a different SDK to use for building this task. If `None`, it will use the project's settings for the AIR/Flex SDK. You can add entries to this in the Extension's settings under 'SDKs -> Installed SDKs'

title: Exporting Release Build Options
description: All the below options are used when using the `Export Release Build...` option. They allow you to customize what is used when trying to export a package. This allows for using one project to build for different types of devices by using different task.

children.title: Additional Options
children.description: Some additional options that are used for generating the release build. Right now, they are used, but may end up being programmatically set.

children.title: Export Release
children.description: Options for exporting a release build of this application. These are only used when using the `Export Release Build...` option

children.title: Export to folder
children.description: The location of folder containing the output, relative to your project's folder

children.title: Application file
children.placeholder: If empty, your project's Main Application file
children.description: This will default to your project's Main application file, or you can select a different one for this type of export

children.title: Export as
values: Intermediate AIRI package that must be manually signed later

children.title: Digital Signature
children.description:
Certificate and password options for building.

These are the setting that will be used for building and running. Exporting release builds will default to these values, unless otherwise specified in the task

children.title: Certificate
children.description: Select the .p12 to sign this build with. If empty, this will default to use the certificate set in the Projects's preferences.

children.title: Package Contents
children.description: When preparing the export package, these file will be excluded from the build.

children.title: Use custom Packaging Contents
children.description: If this is checked, the settings below will be used to exclude files when packaging a release build.

children.title: Files to exclude when packaging
children.description: Remember, to use these options, ensure the above `Use custom Packaging Contents` is checked.

children.title: Native Extensions
children.description: ActionScript Native Extensions (ANE) allow you to incorporate native platform capabilities into your application and use them like standard libraries

children.title: Use custom ANE settings
children.description: If this is checked, the settings below will be used for ANES when packaging a release build.

children.title: Native extensions
children.comment: This should really show a list of the ANE Details, checkbox if it's used, checkbox if you want to package. May need to look into the "resolve" options to see if that's possible
